choose.when: select a.id as brandid,a.name as brandname from vehicle_brand a;
SELECT b.id as brandid, b.name as brandname FROM vehicle_brand a LEFT JOIN vehicle_series_group b ON b.brand_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{brandId};

SELECT c.id as brandid,c.full_name as brandname FROM vehicle_brand a LEFT JOIN vehicle_series_group b ON b.brand_id = a.id LEFT JOIN vehicle_series c ON a.id = c.brand_id AND b.id = c.group_id WHERE a.id = #{brandId} and b.id=#{groupId};

SELECT d.id as brandid,d.full_name as brandname FROM vehicle_brand a LEFT JOIN vehicle_series_group b ON b.brand_id = a.id LEFT JOIN vehicle_series c ON a.id = c.brand_id AND b.id = c.group_id LEFT JOIN vehicle_info d ON a.id = d.brand_id AND b.id = d.group_id AND c.id = d.series_id WHERE a.id = #{brandId} and b.id=#{groupId} and c.id=#{seriesId};
